```{r}
#| label: load-packages
#| warnings: false

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
theme_set(theme_minimal())
```

Generate and plot a binomial distribution with p = 0.3 and n = 15

```{r}
binom_dist <- tibble(success_n = 0:12,
                     prob  = dbinom(0:12, p = 0.3, size = 15))

glimpse(binom_dist)
```

)

Plot the binomial distribution

```{r}
#| label: binomial-bars
#| echo: false
 
binom_dist %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = success_n,
             y = prob)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity",
           fill = "darkred") +
  labs(x = "Successes",
       y = "Probability")

```
